item.title: Exam Tips - Journalism
item.description: Current Affairs Structure of Newsroom and structures Stringers, editors, all those roless Should be prepared to write a hard news article interviews - prepare an interview profile of a celebrity - profile writing - before interview analytical questions editing an article, copyediting marks FOR ANSWERS - Write - introduction characteristics examples

item.title: Psychology Sem IV modules
item.description: From John Santrock’s Lifespan Development MODULE I: INTRODUCTION TO LIFE-SPAN DEVELOPMENT a) Concept of human development and Life-span perspective [[Life Span Development]] b) Patterns of change and development: Normative and Ideographic c) Characteristics and Principles of Development d) Key issues in life-span perspective: Nature v/s Nurture, Continuity v/s Discontinuity, Activity v/s Passivity, Specificity v/s Generality e) Types of developmental research designs: Cross-sectional design, Longitudinal design, Sequential design, , Case Study method, Ethnography, Cohort Design

item.title: Sem IV English Syllabus
item.description: Module 1: The Essay [[Room of Ones Own|Room of One’s Own]] The Character of Dogs- R. L Stevenson
